systems.name: Achievement System
systems.description: System managing player achievements across various categories including Onboarding, Combat Progression, Social Progression, Feats, and Challenges.
systems.mechanics: Players unlock achievements by completing specific tasks or reaching milestones. Achievements are categorized and displayed in a UI with tabs for each category.
systems.objectives: Encourage player engagement, retention, and progression through structured challenges and rewards.

logic_rules.description: Defines how achievements are unlocked based on player actions or milestones.
logic_rules.trigger: Player completes a specific task or reaches a milestone.
logic_rules.effect: Achievement is marked as unlocked, and a notification is displayed.

logic_rules.description: Defines when and how notifications for achievements are displayed to the player.
logic_rules.trigger: Achievement is unlocked while the player is in Home.
logic_rules.effect: A push notification appears on the screen, and a red exclamation mark is shown on the Achievements tab.

logic_rules.description: Defines how the UI updates to reflect achievement status and rewards.
logic_rules.trigger: Achievement status changes or reward is claimed.
logic_rules.effect: UI elements such as icons, progress bars, and tabs are updated to reflect current achievement status.

requirements.title: Achievement Categorization
requirements.description: Achievements must be categorized into Onboarding, Combat Progression, Social Progression, Feats, and Challenges.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Each achievement is assigned to one of the defined categories and displayed accordingly in the UI.

requirements.title: Notification System
requirements.description: Implement a notification system to alert players of newly unlocked achievements.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Push notifications appear when achievements are unlocked, and visual indicators like red exclamation marks are displayed on relevant UI elements.

requirements.title: Reward Distribution
requirements.description: Ensure rewards are distributed appropriately based on achievement difficulty and player effort.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Rewards increase in value with achievement difficulty and are diverse to cater to different player types.
